title: Textile, 1911–12
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
A: Height: 18.4 cm (7 1/4 in.), Width: 27.6 cm (10 7/8 in.)
B: Height: 19.1 cm (7 1/2 in.), Width: 15.2 cm (6 in.)
C: Height: 12.1 cm (4 3/4 in.), Width: 19.1 cm (7 1/2 in.)
D: Height: 19.1 cm (7 1/2 in.), Width: 14.9 cm (5 7/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Pattern incomplete. Floral pattern treated as a medallion, in offset repeat. (a) Violet, blue, green, ochre and brown on black ground; (b and c) violet, light blue, brown, taupe and dark red on dark green ground; (d) violet, blue, turquoise, light brown, dark pink and black on ivory ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
